get.description:
Health check endpoint
Returns HTTP 200 with status ok

post.description:
Receive BEP20 (BSC) transaction confirmation webhooks.

This endpoint processes blockchain transaction confirmations
and updates user wallet balances accordingly.

Register a new user and create their wallet.

Creates a user account with optional Telegram ID and returns JWT tokens.

Login user with username/password.

For admin users, TOTP code is required.
Refresh access token using refresh token.

Create a withdrawal request.

Creates a pending withdrawal transaction and enqueues a background task
to process the withdrawal.

Join a contest.

Atomically debits user's wallet and creates a contest entry.
If contest becomes full, enqueues payout computation task.

Manually trigger contest settlement (admin only).

Computes winners and enqueues payout distribution.

Approve a withdrawal transaction (admin only).

Enqueues the withdrawal processing task.

Settle a contest and distribute payouts (admin only).

This endpoint triggers the settlement process for a contest, which:
1. Locks the contest to prevent concurrent settlements
2. Calculates prize pool, commission, and payouts
3. Credits winning balances to participants
4. Creates transaction records
5. Marks contest as settled
6. Records audit log

The operation is atomic and idempotent - it can be called multiple times
safely without double-paying winners.

get.description:
Debug endpoint to introspect token claims and user info.
Only available when ENABLE_DEBUG_ENDPOINT=true and in development environment
